thread.title: NPI Welcomes Andre Daly to Board of Directors
thread.title_full: NPI Welcomes Andre Daly to Board of Directors - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NPI Welcomes Andre Daly to Board of Directors
text:
Daly brings years of experience and knowledge of the global marketplace to board
Boca Raton, Florida (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Nutritional Products International, a company dedicated to the marketing and distribution of a wide variety of nutritional, cosmetic, health and wellness products, announced the addition of Andre Daly to its Board of Directors.
Daly is responsible for the inception of multiple successful companies and ventures throughout his professional tenure, most notable the founding of Atka Pharma. Atka enjoyed tremendous success as it focused on the growth and globalization of numerous brands throughout South Africa, Africa and Asia. Mr. Daly was eventually able to sell his brainchild for a multi-million dollar figure, while simultaneously staying on board as the companies CEO.
“I’m honored to be joining the Nutritional Products International team,” said Daly. “NPI has a great track record for finding some outstanding new health and nutritional products and delivering them to the masses. They’ve helped many people to live healthier, fuller lives, which is a goal I can certainly bet behind.”
Andre has been involved in the establishment and management of business start-ups and executive management for over 20 years. Andre attended The University of South Africa, where he developed a passion to drive the success of various types of businesses. He has degrees in Computer Programming and Business Systems Engineering,
“This is a man who’s had tremendous success in the growth and globalization of multiple South African brands,” said Mitch Gould, CEO of NPI. “We are pleased to be able to have his expertise and insight on our board, and look forward to the tremendous contributions he is certain to make going forward. Andre joins our exemplary board of directors, which includes actors, athletes and business leaders and he is now able to add an international flair to the team.”
About Nutritional Products International (NPI):
Headquartered in Boca Raton, FL, Nutritional Products International (NPI) is a privately held company staffed with a complimentary team of marketing professionals that specializes in retail distribution of Nutraceuticals, Dietary Supplements, Functional Beverages, and Skin Care Products. NPI offers a unique proven approach for product manufacturers world wide seeking to launch or expand distribution of their products in the U.S. retail market. For more information, please visit http://www.nutricompany.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13003275.htm
